abilities.description: Conjures blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
notes: Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.
Familiars within range of Visage will receive bonuses from Gravekeeper's Cloak and Grave Chill.
abilities.lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.

abilities.name: Stone For
abilities.description: After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After 6.0 seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.

abilities.name: Aether Remnant
abilities.description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
abilities.lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.

abilities.name: Dissimilate
abilities.description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
abilities.lore: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.

abilities.name: Resonant Pulse
abilities.description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a physical damage barrier and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The barrier gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
abilities.lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.

abilities.name: Astral Step
abilities.description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.25 seconds and then detonates.
notes: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.
abilities.lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
notes: The shared damage type is the same as the type of damage inflicted.
abilities.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
abilities.lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to [10, 12, 14, 16] seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3.0 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
notes: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.
abilities.lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives [60, 60, 60] seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
notes: This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
abilities.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.description: Weaver launches a swarm of [12, 12, 12, 12] young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
notes: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires.
Beetles are Spell Immune, but can be killed in [6, 6, 8, 8] attacks from a unit. Heroes deal double damage to beetles.
Beetles provide vision.
abilities.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.
abilities.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
notes: Additional attacks leave Weaver 0.25 seconds after the previous one, and have no range limit.
abilities.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.
notes: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.
Time Lapse disjoints projectiles.
abilities.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.
notes: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 575 behind the target.
Shackleshot can be disjointed.
abilities.lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to [1] second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.
notes: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
abilities.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
notes: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
abilities.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

abilities.name: Gale Force
abilities.description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
abilities.lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain [350, 425, 500] additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
notes: Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
Windranger can move while attacking.
abilities.lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.

abilities.name: Arctic Burn
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of [4.0, 6.0, 8.0, 10.0]% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.
notes: Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to 0.1.
The damage and slow from Arctic Burn can be dispelled.
abilities.lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.

abilities.name: Splinter Blast
abilities.description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 base radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30%.
notes: The primary projectile moves at 650 movement speed, or reaches the target in 1.0 second, whichever is faster.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed.
abilities.lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.

abilities.name: Cold Embrace
abilities.description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
abilities.lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.

abilities.name: Winter's Curse
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern dispells then freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.
notes: If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
If there are no allies within range of the Cursed enemy for 2.5 seconds the effect will end early.
abilities.lore: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 200% damage to creeps.
notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
abilities.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units and damaging enemies for 100% of the heal value, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
notes: Healing/Damage is done in [0.33, 0.33, 0.33, 0.33] second intervals.
Can heal Spell Immune units.
abilities.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
notes: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.
abilities.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.

abilities.name: Voodoo Switcheroo
abilities.description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of [8] seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.
notes: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
abilities.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target. Summoned skeletons around the target will receive bonus movement and attack speed for the duration of the debuff.
notes: If Wraith King has summoned skeletons, casting Wraithfire Blast on a target will order all of the skeletons to attack that target.
abilities.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

abilities.name: Vampiric Spirit
abilities.description: Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed. Skeletons deal less damage to buildings.
notes: Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
abilities.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
abilities.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed, and spawn [1, 2, 3] skeleton(s) to attack each nearby enemy hero. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.
notes: Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
abilities.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.
abilities.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.
abilities.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

abilities.name: Heavenly Jump
abilities.description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Nimbus
abilities.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
notes: Grants 125 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.
abilities.lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.

abilities.name: Lightning Hands
abilities.description: Zeus's gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of it's damage.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
abilities.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
